title: Is the world better off with technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't think we can make the judgement that it is better or worse. It simply is. A child born today will have a completely different life than those who came before her or him. As older adults, we might get caught in the sticky trap of nostalgia and think of all that has been “lost” in society as a result of technology. The child born today will have no comprehension of what has been lost. They will only know what they experience now. We can educate them about the “past”, but the youth are our teachers for the future if we will listen and learn from them.

Yes, because technology was made to make our lifes better. Yes it may hurt our lifes alot yes, but it mostly helps us. Take me for example, I can’t live with out either a TV, phone, computer, or tablet, and technology hasen’t hurt me at all.
